name: Egg (itch)
description:
Egg is a simple, but fun platformer where the goal is to save chickens trapped within eggs.  You play as a recently hatched chick who still has a shell.

HOW TO PLAY

Default Controls:

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Down-Dash - S

Jump - Spacebar

Flutter - Hold  Spacebar

Roll - LeftShift

Pause - P

Roll and Down-Dash enemies to bounce!

Note: Controls are changeable in Options (accessible from both Main Menu and Pause screen)

Developed and published by Ian Matic in conjunction Justin Vaughn, Brodie Davison, and Brady Friese.
